channel.title: Announcement on Dragonfly
channel.description: Recent content in Announcement on Dragonfly

item.title: Infrastructure should be boring
item.description: Infrastructure should be boring. Boring is good. Boring means that it just works, and you donâ€™t have to worry about it. A year ago, we went on a quest to build a boring in-memory store.

item.title: 10K Stars
item.description: Dragonfly crossed the 10K GitHub stars milestone in just 75 days. What an incredible start for our journey!

item.title: Announcing Dragonfly
item.description: We could not have predicted the events of the last days. In a single week, Dragonfly transformed from a dream to reality.
